name: Springvale
description: A quaint town known for its fresh water springs.

connectedLocations.description: Surrounds this location, dense and mysterious.
The western exit leads toward the trade route.

parentLocation.description: Springvale is part of Kingdom A, a prosperous land.

subLocations.description: Elena's forge, filled with tools and iron.
Bustling with traders selling fresh produce.

pointsOfInterest.name: Ancient Stone Fountain
pointsOfInterest.description: A moss-covered fountain, water still trickling from its mouth.

pointsOfInterest.name: Town Notice Board
pointsOfInterest.description: A wooden board covered with old and new postings.

historyLog.description: Guard Thomas warned the player about bandits.

notes: Springvale is known for its friendly people and secret underground tunnels.
